Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}

{3: 'With some distance still to cover, to accommodate you, the only human in the group, Kiske manages to find a small electric vehicle with a sidecar. Together, the three of you embark on a wobbly journey.'}
{3: 'The sidecar of the vehicle is quite compact, forcing Teddy and you to squeeze closely together.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I just wanted a new pair of headphones. How did things get this complicated...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She frowns as she taps on her terminal.'}
{2: "You're good with musical instruments?", 3: '14'}
{3: 'On second thought, it does make sense to you. After all, a young lady from the Norman family like her would probably possess some artistic talents...'}
{3: 'Which instrument could it be, though? Piano? Violin? Or maybe clarinet?'}
{3: 'The mental image of Teddy in an exquisite gown on stage, playing the piano with a disgruntled expression, somehow makes you want to laugh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Control those wild thoughts of yours.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Shouldn't noble ladies be good at playing elegant instruments?", 3: '20'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Great, because I'm the one who can't play any instruments.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Then, you're good at... singing?", 3: '23'}
{3: "Even though you've never heard her sing, perhaps Teddy is surprisingly talented at it?"}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'What a coincidenceâ€”I happen to be tone-deaf.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Expressionless, she edits a string of code on the terminal and speaks again after a moment of hesitation.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's not like I haven't tried... Ahem.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Don't tell anyone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've attempted recording songs before... The starting notes were usually spot on, but somehow, they always took a weird turn in the middle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I thought it was my vocal module acting up, so I checked it multiple times but couldn't spot any errors...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hey, I heard you laugh.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm sorry.", 3: '39', 4: 'Can I listen to them?', 5: '37'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "...Don't even dream about it. Those files have been permanently banished to the recycle bin. No one in this world will ever lay ears on them.", 4: '1'}
{3: "It turns out she's not skilled with instruments, and singing is not her forte either..."}
{2: 'So, how are you planning to beat them?', 3: '42'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'There are other options, you know, like... getting you up on stage to do some singing.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'While you once learned to sing the F.O.S. graduation song in a large choir, simply mouthing the lyrics could allow you to blend in seamlessly, even if you went off-key.'}
{3: "Given your limited singing experience, you don't really have the confidence to outshine such a long mashup orchestrated by some awakened machines."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Just kidding, I wouldn't make you do that.", 4: '1'}
{2: "But you really can't sing?", 3: '49'}
{3: 'Seeing her with those large headphones every day, you have always assumed she would be listening to music.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Not every lady needs to learn fine arts, and not everyone with headphones is listening to music... You really have some weird stereotypes in mind.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "You don't have any other funky ideas about me, do you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Are you sure?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Anything like all pink-haired people are secretly dark inside? Or the pinker their hair, the harsher their words?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Umm...', 3: '59', 4: "I've never heard of those.", 5: '58'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Really? I'm not buying that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How did you know these anyway...', 3: '60'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'From the Engineering Force threads on the Babylonia forum.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "You also have an account, right? Don't tell me you've never checked the Babylonia forum.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I see. You're not keeping tabs on the Engineering Force threads very often.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Is the Gray Raven Commandant really that busy...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Oh, speaking of stereotypes...', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'The WGAA once hosted a painting event featuring the Gray Raven Commandant there. I heard that someone sketched you with three heads and six arms, while another imagined you at five meters tall...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Who could actually be five meters tall?!', 3: '73', 4: "That's not true. Fake news.", 5: '73'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'And someone said that during surface missions, the Gray Raven Commandant could rip Corrupted apart with bare hands, kick Hetero-Creatures, and take down Ascendants solo...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Begging for mercy already? I haven't even told you about the wilder ones yet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've found some photos of that exhibition. Want to check them out?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Heh, I was just joking.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "...Surprisingly lively, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Anyway, those are all strange stereotypes.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Teddy', 3: "There's even this rumor that during combat, the Gray Raven squad would turn into super whirlwind warriors, and that Cerberus would really transform into three mechanical dogs...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'For real?', 3: '84', 4: 'This is just wild.', 5: '84'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "So, don't judge people based on stereotypes.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She continues tapping on her terminal, not even looking up.'}
{2: "I'm sorry.", 3: '88', 4: "I didn't mean that.", 5: '88'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Hmm... Don't take it personally. I'm just gathering some materials...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Ahem, forget about it. It's nothing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'So, can I count on you for this competition?', 3: '92'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Up to you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy appears indifferent to whether you trust her or not.'}
{3: 'Before the Gestalt incident, your interactions with Teddy were limited.'}
{3: 'This vice-captain of the Engineering Force typically maintains a low profile. You mostly hear about her from Karenina and other members of the Engineering Force.'}
{3: 'Even when analyzing the "invitation", you only discovered the existence of such a brilliant technician in the Engineering Force through Asimov\'s recommendation.'}
{3: "You don't know her very well, but everyone unanimously agrees that she is a highly reliable vice-captain when talking about her."}
{3: "While she doesn't frequently fight on the battlefield, having her at the rear ensures peace of mind."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "...Where did you dig up these quirky remarks from? It's kinda cringe.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Does this also count as a stereotype?', 3: '104'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "...You're not getting back at me for the three heads and six arms comment, are you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No, not at all.', 3: '107', 4: 'Of course not.', 5: '107'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Looks like... some of the things people say about you might actually be true.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "...I'm not telling you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lines of code swiftly emerge from the terminal screen, forming complex commands.'}
{2: 'Are you still working?', 3: '119'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Huh? No, this isn't work. Just a little synthesis program.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Disassemble, synthesize, and reassemble.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "...And it's done.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she talks to you, her hands never cease their motion, and soon, she presses the final key.'}
{2: "...It's over, just like that?", 3: '126', 4: "It's already done?", 5: '126'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...What else were you expecting to see?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'The terminal would explode after I typed the last character? Or a meteor shower of data falling from the sky?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not something like that.', 3: '130', 4: 'Can you make those happen?', 5: '131'}
{3: 'You just thought there should be some sort of celebration after all the hard work, maybe like a little bear blowing a trumpet.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...Looks like I need to change my impression of you again.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Anyway, rest assured and leave this competition to me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'We can definitely beat them.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory311.png'}
{3: 'In an uncharted area of Constellia, Kiske drives the small vehicle with you and Teddy into a semi-underground venue.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: 'This used to be our practice spot...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Outside the door, the emblem of Thunder Sparks has been crossed out and replaced with another complex symbol.'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "It's them... Abyssal Ragetide.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoid angrily kicks a tin can at the entrance.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Kiske... You're here too?"}
{3: 'From a different direction, another small mechanoid arrives on a little electric vehicle and hops off.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: "Little Sam... I just can't accept it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'Look who I found! The Gray Raven Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Sam', 3: "It's actually the Gray Raven Commandant! We can definitely win this time!"}
{2: 'Huh?', 3: '156', 4: 'No need to get so worked up...', 5: '156'}
{2: 'Little Sam', 3: "Last time, our mashup wasn't as long or expansive as Abyssal Ragetide's, but I know we can do it this time!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: 'We definitely can! The Gray Raven Commandant is with us, after all!', 4: '1'}
